Enum Constant Detail

CASE_INSENSITIVE

public static final CrSetting CASE_INSENSITIVE
Case insensitive flag. If true, the case of the responses will be ignored when tested. Default is true.

ALLOW_DUPLICATE_RESPONSES

public static final CrSetting ALLOW_DUPLICATE_RESPONSES
Allow duplicate response values to be used. Default is false.

CHAI_ATTRIBUTE_NAME

public static final CrSetting CHAI_ATTRIBUTE_NAME
Setting key to control the ldap attribute name used when reading/writing Chai Challenge/Response formats.

Default: carLicense

See Also:
ChaiResponseSet, ConfigObjectRecord

CHAI_CASE_INSENSITIVE

public static final CrSetting CHAI_CASE_INSENSITIVE
Setting key to control if chai response sets are stored in "case insensitive" format.

Default: true

See Also:
ChaiResponseSet

CHAI_RECORD_ID

public static final CrSetting CHAI_RECORD_ID
Setting key to control the COR RecordType used when reading/writing Chai Challenge/Response formats.

Default: 0002

See Also:
ChaiResponseSet, ConfigObjectRecord

DEFAULT_READ_MODE

public static final CrSetting DEFAULT_READ_MODE
Default mode for reading ChallengeResponse settings.

Default: CrMode.CHAI_SHA1_SALT

See Also:
CrMode

DEFAULT_WRITE_MODE

public static final CrSetting DEFAULT_WRITE_MODE
Default mode for writing ChallengeResponse settings.

Default: CrMode.CHAI_SHA1_SALT

See Also:
CrMode

forKey

public static CrSetting forKey(String key)
For a given key, find the associated setting. If no setting matches the supplied key, null is returned.

Parameters:
key - string value of the setting's key.
Returns:
the setting associated witht the key, or null.
See Also:
getKey()

getDefaultValue

public String getDefaultValue()
Returns the default value for this setting. If no other value is configured, then the default value is used

Returns:
the default value

getKey

public String getKey()
Get the key name, suitable for use in a Properties instance

key name
